buzz

A small/lightweight statically typed scripting language

Guide Reference 

import "std";

| üë®‚ÄçüöÄ buzz is a simple unambiguous scripting language
object Person {
    str name,
    int age = 18,

    fun growUp() > int {
        this.age = this.age + 1;

        return this.age;
    }
}

fun main([str] args) > void {
    Person me = Person{
        name = "Giann",
        age = 36,
    };

    print("Hello I'm {me.name} and I'm {me.age}.");
}
